title: HoloViz: What's new and what's next
description: Updates and roadmaps for Panel, hvPlot, HoloViews, GeoViews, Datashader, Param, and Colorcet. The HoloViz suite of tools together form a unified approach for visualization from exploration to sharing applications and dashboards, building on the SciPy ecosystem to support easy visualization of large multidimensional or columnar datasets.
